<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Smoke Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3288) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

</column>

---

You're used to fighting and hiding in a haze of smoke and flame. You automatically succeed at the DC 5 flat check to target a [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) creature if that creature is concealed only by smoke. When you are concealed or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) in smoke, increase the DC of the flat check to target you to 6 if you're concealed or 12 if you're hidden.
